p: In 2018, for example, a Massachusetts judge dismissed charges against climate activists, noting the necessity of protest (Chow, 2018). In 2019, courts in London (UK) upheld “necessity to act” defences for civil disobedience, for example, when a jury absolved two co-founders of the Extinction Rebellion of charges emerging from subversive acts to pressure divestments from fossil fuels (Corbett, 2019).
